description: This file defines the LoyaltyService class, which provides methods to fetch user loyalty points and history from an API endpoint. It uses the Dio package for HTTP requests and handles errors appropriately.

classes.name: LoyaltyService
classes.description: Service class for retrieving loyalty information such as points and transaction history.

methods.name: LoyaltyService
methods.description: Constructor that initializes LoyaltyService with an ApiClient instance.

methods.name: getLoyalty
methods.description: Fetches loyalty data for the user from the '/loyalty' API endpoint and returns a Loyalty object.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles DioException errors, extracting message details or default error messages.
